# Part 0. Basic Setup 

Read in the necessary data

```{r data}
tar_load(config)
stopifnot(exists("config"))

tar_load(emf_data_long)
stopifnot(exists("emf_data_long"))

tar_load(emf_summary_long)
stopifnot(exists("emf_summary_long"))

tar_load(sb_batch_figmap)
stopifnot(exists("sb_batch_figmap"))
```

3. Process Data 

```{r data processing, echo=FALSE}
# bring in processed special cases
full_df <- sb_batch_figmap

## Reorder the scenarios 
full_df <- full_df %>%
  filter(scenario %in% config$main_scenarios) %>%
  mutate(scenario = factor(scenario, levels = config$main_scenarios))

## Group and rename the variables
full_df <- full_df %>%
  group_by(model, scenario, region, year, unit, higher_level, datasrc, group) %>%
  filter(group != 0) 

full_df <- full_df %>% 
  mutate(variable = str_replace_all(basename(str_replace_all(variable, "\\|", "/")),
                                                "/", "\\|"))
```


```{r data processing 2: calculate the distance to Ref scenario, echo=FALSE}
### Compute the difference between other scenarios and the no target reference scenario

# filter out groups with 2 or more scenarios
full_df <- full_df %>% 
  group_by(model, region, year, unit, higher_level, datasrc, group, variable) %>%
  mutate(n = n()) %>% 
  filter(n >= 2) 

# compute the difference
dat <- full_df %>% 
  filter("NT.Ref" %in% unique(scenario)) %>% 
  mutate(diff = value - value[scenario == 'NT.Ref']) %>% ungroup()

full_df <- full_df %>% ungroup() %>% 
  full_join(dat)


## Group and rename the variables
full_df <- full_df %>%
  group_by(model, scenario, region, year, unit, higher_level, datasrc, group) %>%
  filter(group != 0) 

# simplify variable name to be the last segment
# e.g., Capacity|Electricity|Coal -> Coal
full_df <- full_df %>% 
  mutate(variable = str_replace_all(basename(str_replace_all(variable, "\\|", "/")),
                                                "/", "\\|"))
```

# Part 1. Make graphs 

## 1. x = scenario, y = diff, color = variable, facet = model

1) Sample graph 

```{r make sample graph 1, fig.align="center", echo = FALSE,fig.width = 6}
df = full_df
unique_higher_level = unique(df$higher_level)

dat = df %>% filter(higher_level == unique_higher_level[10], year == params$plot_year) 

print(stacked_bar_plot_fn(df = dat, 
                          x = "scenario", y = "diff", 
                          color = "variable", facet = "model",
                        mapping_list = list(xlab = "",
                           ylab= unique(dat$unit),
                           title = paste(unique(dat$higher_level)," (",params$plot_year,")",sep = ""))))
```

2) Loop to make all the graphs

```{r make graphs 1, echo=FALSE}
df = full_df
unique_higher_level = unique(df$higher_level)

for (plot_year in params$plot_years) {
  pdf(file=paste("output/round1/stacked_bar_batch/diff_", plot_year,"stackbar.pdf",sep=""), 
      width = 12, height = 6)
  
  for (level in unique_higher_level) {
    dat = df %>% filter(higher_level == level, year == plot_year)
    
    if (nrow(dat) == 0) {
      print(paste('there is no observation for ', level, sep = ""))
    } else if (!(length(unique(dat$unit))==1)) {
      print(paste('there are multiple units for ', level, sep = ""))
    } else {
      
    print(stacked_bar_plot_fn(df = dat, 
                            x = "scenario", y = "diff", 
                            color = "variable", facet = "model",
                          mapping_list = list(xlab = "",
                             ylab= unique(dat$unit),
                             title = paste(unique(dat$higher_level), 
                                           " (",plot_year, ")", sep = ""))))
    }
  }
  
  dev.off()
  
}

```

b) Loop to make all the graphs

```{r make graphs 2, echo=FALSE}
unique_higher_level = unique(df$higher_level)

# png(filename="test.png", width=1000, height=600)
pdf(file=paste("output/round1/stacked_bar_batch/diff_year_scenario_stackbar.pdf",sep=""), width = 10, height = 6)
i = 0
for (level in unique_higher_level) {
  i = i+ 1
  if (i %% 10 == 0) {
    print(i)
  }
  
  dat = df %>% filter(higher_level == level) 
  
  if (nrow(dat) == 0) {
    print(paste('there is no observation for ', level, sep = ""))
  } else if (!(length(unique(dat$unit))==1)) {
    print(paste('there are multiple units for ', level, sep = ""))
  } else {

  print(stacked_bar_plot_fn2(df = dat, 
                          x1 = "year", x2 = "scenario", 
                          y = "diff", 
                          color = "variable", 
                          facet = "model",
                        mapping_list = list(xlab = "",
                           ylab= unique(dat$unit),
                           title = unique(dat$higher_level))))

  }
}

dev.off()
```
